updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: Malware Name
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Malware Name

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload with TSS

Perform Upload to Box application with malware file.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure malware Name is displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: Malware Name for browse activity
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Malware Name

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Enable TSS-scan-v3 and TSS-on-browse.

Create user alert policy for with browse.

Access any website which has malware content for browse.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure Malware Name is displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed in browser notification.

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: Malware Name for browse activity with site which does not have malware content
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Malware Name

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Enable TSS-scan-v3 and TSS-on-browse.

Create user alert policy for with browse.

Set default action as useralert with custom template.

Access any website which does not have malware content for browse.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure Malware Name is displayed as empty in message and subtitle field are displayed in browser notification.

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: DLP profiles
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: DLP profiles

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload with DLP

Perform Upload to Box application which has DLP content.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure all the DLP profiles name (for which policy is being hit) are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: DLP profiles
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Malware Name

Change usernotification setting to client.

Perform Upload to Box application which has DLP content.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure all the DLP profiles name (for which policy is being hit) are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in browser notification.

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: HTTP Referer
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: HTTP Referer

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Create user alert policy for browse activity

Access the link which has referer URL
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure all the HTTP referer is displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in browser notification.

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure all the URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

Check the logs from proxy. Make sure the fields are displayed as expected.

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Create user alert policy for browse activity.

Access the URL.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure all the URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in browser notification.

updated_cases.title: [Browser] Verify redirect URL with new variables: Source IP, Destination IP, Groups, OU, POP, From User, Date, Time, HTTP Referer
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with new name for redirect URL: Source IP, Destination IP, Groups, OU, POP, From User, Date, Time, HTTP Referer.

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Create UJ policy with custom template for browse activity.

Access the URL.

Click on block option.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure Source IP, Destination IP, Groups, OU, POP, From User, Date, Time, HTTP Referer are present in redirected URL

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify redirect URL with new variables: Malware Name for browse activity
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with new variables in redirect URL: Malware Name

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Enable TSS-scan-v3 and TSS-on-browse.

Create user alert policy for with browse.

Access any website which has malware content for browse.

Click on BLOCK option.
updated_cases.custom_expected: Make sure Malware Name is present in the redirected URL.
